entry.title: 在github上搭建一个Hexo博客，主题：Fluid
entry.content:
More detail can be found at Fluid

Build hexo blog at local

Attention:
The following instructions are pseudo code:

  1. install nodejs npm
  2. npm install hexo-cli
  3. hexo init your-blog-dir
  4. go to path-to-your-blog-dir
  5. npm install && npm install hexo-theme-fluid (make sure hexo’s version is over 5.0.0)
  6. change the value theme in _config.yml to fluid
  7. cp node_modules/hexo-theme-fluid/_config.yml to current dir
  8. hexo g && hexo s, here, ‘g’ means generate and ‘s’ means server

Get a github page

Just create a repository named your_blog_name.github.io

Push to github

Search deploy in file _config.yml, and modify:

and then npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
finally hexo deploy, or simply hexo d

Wait a minute. You your blog your_blog_name.github.io can be opened.
